history.proof: intros n a. unfold extEqual. induction n as [|n' IHn]. - simpl. apply beq_nat_eq. srun best use: beq_nat_refl unfold: naryFunc. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros n a. unfold extEqual. induction n as [|n' IHn]. - intros x y Hxy. simpl. apply Hxy. - intros x y Hxy. simpl. apply IHn. intros i. apply Hxy.
